articles.title: What channel is Colts vs Vikings on today? Time, TV schedule for NFL Sunday Night Football - Oklahoman.com
articles.description: It's the Indianapolis Colts vs. Minnesota Vikings in Week 9 of the 2024 NFL season. Here's how to watch, including time, TV channel and streaming info.
articles.content:
Week 9 of the 2024 NFL season's Sunday night game will feature the Indianapolis Colts, who will travel to U.S. Bank Stadium to take on the Minnesota Vikings.
